titleStmt.title: A plea for prerogative, or, Give Cæsar his due being the wheele of fortune turn'd round, or, the world turned topsie-turvie : wherein is described the true subjects loyalty to maintain His Majesties prerogative and priviledges of Parliament / by Thorny Aylo, alias, John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
